title: Empower Your Local Community: Build a Landing Page, Boost Visibility
name: Local Business Boost Hackathon
brief: Support local businesses by building impactful landing pages in this hackathon!
about: This hackathon challenges designers, developers, and marketing enthusiasts to build landing pages for local businesses in need of a digital presence. Help empower your community and support local businesses!
whatToBuild: Create user-friendly and visually appealing landing pages for local businesses. Focus on showcasing essential information, capturing leads, and driving conversions.
howToParticipate: Register for the hackathon by clicking the button below.
Choose a business from our list of participating local businesses.
Form a team (optional) to combine design, development, and marketing expertise.
Build your landing page using your creativity and skills.
Submit your completed landing page before the deadline.

judgingCriteria.heading: Design
judgingCriteria.copy: Visual appeal, user experience, and brand alignment.

judgingCriteria.heading: Functionality
judgingCriteria.copy: Ease of use, responsiveness, and effectiveness in capturing leads.

judgingCriteria.heading: Clarity of Information
judgingCriteria.copy: Clear presentation of the business's offerings and value proposition.

judgingCriteria.heading: Overall Impact
judgingCriteria.copy: Potential of the landing page to drive business growth for the chosen local business.

title: AI for Good: Solve Real-World Challenges with Artificial Intelligence
name: AI for Good Hackathon
brief: Develop innovative AI solutions that address global challenges in this hackathon!
about: This hackathon challenges data scientists, developers, and AI enthusiasts to leverage their skills for good. Build AI solutions that tackle pressing issues like climate change, healthcare accessibility, or social justice.
whatToBuild: Focus on developing AI-powered applications that address a specific challenge area. Consider machine learning models, computer vision, natural language processing, or other AI techniques.
howToParticipate: Register for the hackathon by clicking the button below.
Choose a challenge area that aligns with your interests and expertise.
Form a team (optional) to combine diverse skills in data science, development, and design.
Develop your AI solution using the provided datasets and resources.
Present your project to a panel of judges and compete for exciting prizes.

judges.name: David Lee
judges.title: Head of Product at Socially Aware Inc.

judgingCriteria.heading: Impact and Innovation
judgingCriteria.copy: Potential of the AI solution to address the chosen challenge and create positive societal impact.

judgingCriteria.heading: Technical Feasibility
judgingCriteria.copy: Clarity and effectiveness of the chosen AI approach and implementation.

judgingCriteria.heading: Presentation and Communication
judgingCriteria.copy: Clear and concise explanation of the project, its functionalities, and potential benefits.
